vote.title: To authorize an amendment to the 2022 Capital Improvements Budget; to authorize a transfer of cash and appropriation within the Water Bond Fund; to authorize the Director of Public Utilities to enter into a contract with AECOM Technical Services for the Water Distribution System SCADA Improvements project; to authorize the expenditure of up to $485,538.62 from the Water Bond Fund to pay for the project; and to declare an emergency.   ($485,538.62)
vote.description: This item was approved on the Consent Agenda.
